translations: 重做；改进（rework 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: The movie is a reworking of the Frankenstein story.
sentences.translation: 这部电影是根据弗兰肯斯坦科学怪人的故事改编的。

sentences.sentence: repair, reworking or replace we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ;
A reworking of Figure 11, using gates this time.
